parameters.name: ...params
parameters.description: One or more values passed on to the callback.

setTimeout.description: Calls the given function with `param` (and all following parameters) after the specified delay. The actual delay may be slightly longer than the given one.

parameters.name: ...params
parameters.description: One or more values passed on to the callback.

setInterval.description: Calls the given function repeatedly, each times waiting the given delay. The actual delay may be slightly longer than the given one.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID that was returned by `setTimeout`.

clearTimeout.description: Cancels the running timeout associated with the given ID. When given an invalid ID, nothing happens.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID that was returned by `setInterval`.

clearInterval.description: Cancels the running interval associated with the given ID. When given an invalid ID, nothing happens.
